name: pdfding
description: PdfDing is a self-hosted PDF toolkit supporting operations like merging, splitting, rotating, and compressing PDFs. It provides a drag-and-drop web UI for ease of use.
features: PDF merging: Combine multiple PDF files into single document while preserving formatting and page order
PDF splitting: Extract specific pages or split PDFs into separate files based on page ranges or intervals
Page rotation: Rotate individual pages or entire documents by 90, 180, or 270 degrees for correct orientation
PDF compression: Reduce file size by optimizing images and removing unnecessary data while maintaining acceptable quality
Drag-and-drop interface: Intuitive web UI allows file uploads and page reordering through simple drag-and-drop interactions
Batch processing: Apply operations to multiple PDFs simultaneously for efficient bulk document manipulation
Privacy focused: All processing happens on your server without uploading files to third-party services
No file size limits: Process PDFs of any size without restrictions imposed by cloud-based services
Page reordering: Rearrange pages within PDFs by dragging thumbnails to create custom document structures
